forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 13C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 2C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny early then becoming cloudy with periods of light rain later in the day. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clear overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 68F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. Low 37F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 38F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
